Title: Creates a domestic abuse hotline for teens
Summary: Creates a domestic abuse hotline for teens; requires all high schools within the state to conduct an assembly on domestic abuse.
LawCode: Ren §459-h to be §459-i, add §459-h, Soc Serv L; ren §3234 to be §3235, add §3234, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to creating a domestic abuse hotline for teens; and to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a school assembly on domestic abuse
